author: cbs8
title: San Diego County Credit Union Honored at 2015 Outstanding Achievement in Radio Advertising Awards
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE San Diego County Credit Union
Recognized for Best Brand Campaign Using Radio and Best Use of Radio's Digital Assets
SAN DIEGO , Oct. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- San Diego County Credit Union ® (SDCCU ® ) , San Diego's largest locally-owned financial institution, was honored with two distinctions by the Southern California Broadcasters Association and its Sales Management Leadership Council at the 2015 Outstanding Achievement in Radio Advertising Awards. SDCCU received an award for Best Brand Campaign Using Radio and Best Use of Radio's Digital Assets.
"SDCCU is honored to be recognized on a regional level among so many great brands," said Teresa Halleck , president and CEO at SDCCU. "We are especially thankful for our wonderful media partners for their creativity and execution in helping the SDCCU brand come alive through radio to reach millions of people throughout Southern California ."
Los Angeles Mayor Eric Garcetti delivered the keynote address at the Outstanding Achievement in Radio Advertising Awards, held Oct. 21, 2015 at the Universal Hilton Hotel in University City, Calif. Regional advertisers are voted on by the Sales Management Council and represent the very best in creative and effective radio commercials using Southern California's radio and digital platforms.
San Diego County Credit Union is San Diego's largest locally-owned financial institution serving San Diego , Riverside and Orange counties. SDCCU has assets of $7.1 billion , over 300,000 customers, 38 convenient branch locations and 30,000 surcharge-FREE ATMs. SDCCU provides breakthrough banking products that meet the demands of today's lifestyle and delivers banking services that save customers money. SDCCU is leading the way, offering FREE Checking with eStatements, SDCCU Mobile Deposit, mortgage loans, auto loans, Visa ® credit cards and business banking services. Federally insured by NCUA. Equal Housing Opportunity. For more information, visit www.sdccu.com .
